data.name: Ash of Legends
data.detailed_description:
Join our Discord Community


About the Game

Grapple around, build towers, place traps, shoot guns, launch arrows, and throw sabers, to defend objectives from hordes of the evil empire. Ash of Legends is an upcoming, made for VR, first-person, base-building, tower defense, strategy game. Featuring an epic story, multiple heroes, verdant landscapes, and new game mechanics not seen before in a VR tower defense game. Options include smooth, teleport, head-based, controller-based locomotion, vignette, and more. Includes native Oculus and Steam VR support. Story coming soon.

Features:
  • 2 playable heroes: Soldier and Strategist
  • 6 scenes: Tutorial, Hangar, Orchard, City, River, and Underground River
  • 3 difficulties: Easy, Normal, and Hard
  • 1 challenge mode: AirDrop
  • Gameplay length: 20+ hours
  • 9 enemy types
  • A dozen weapons
  • More than a dozen traps and towers
  • 4 comfort features: Vignette, Teleport, Snap turning, Arm swing locomotion
  • 8 modes of locomotion: Grappling, Climbing, Hang Gliding, Hovercraft, Driving a boat, Arm swing, Teleport, and the standard thumbstick-based movement

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti / RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 / RX 5600 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
